data.eml:eml: Persicaria jucunda var. rotunda (Polygonaceae, Persicarieae), a distinct distylous taxa raised to specific rank

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guo, Yue-Ning, Chen, Shao-Feng, Chen, Ming-Lin, Li, Bo (2019): Persicaria jucunda var. rotunda (Polygonaceae, Persicarieae), a distinct distylous taxa raised to specific rank. PhytoKeys 126: 127-138, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.126.35442, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.126.35442
